alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dona Ana County through 445 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary over Dona Ana. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leasburg, Las Cruces, Dona Ana, Organ, East Mesa, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range, Hill and Northeast Las Cruces. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 6 and 17. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 160, and near mile marker 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
